name: Fish Farm Use Cases
description: Complete guide to all use cases in a modern fish farm - from initial setup to harvest and sales. This document walks through the entire fish farming lifecycle with API examples.

phases.name: Phase 1: Farm Setup & Registration
phases.description: Initial setup of the fish farm management system

useCases.name: Register Farm/Company
useCases.description: Register your fish farm as a company in the system. This creates the admin account and sets up the organization.
useCases.when: First time setup - before any other operations
useCases.result: Company created with admin user. You receive account_key and user_key for future operations.

useCases.name: Add Farm Employees/Workers
useCases.description: Add additional users (workers, supervisors, managers) to your farm account.
useCases.when: After company registration, when you need to add team members
useCases.result: New user added to the farm account with specified roles.

useCases.name: Login to Farm System
useCases.description: Authenticate and get access token for API operations.
useCases.when: Every time you start working with the system
useCases.result: Receive JWT access_token and refresh_token for authenticated operations.

phases.name: Phase 2: Infrastructure Setup
phases.description: Create and configure ponds for fish farming

useCases.name: Create a New Pond
useCases.description: Register a new pond in your farm. Each pond tracks fish stock, water quality, and events.
useCases.when: When constructing or adding a new pond to your farm
useCases.result: Pond created with auto-generated pond_id (e.g., ACC001-001). Ready for stocking.

useCases.name: Create Grow-out Pond
useCases.description: Create a larger pond for growing fish to harvest size.
useCases.when: Setting up production ponds for mature fish
useCases.result: Grow-out pond created and ready for fish transfer from nursery.

useCases.name: Update Pond Details
useCases.description: Modify pond information like capacity, equipment, or metadata.
useCases.when: When pond specifications change or need correction
useCases.result: Pond details updated successfully.

useCases.name: List All Ponds
useCases.description: Get overview of all ponds in your farm with their current status.
useCases.when: Dashboard view, reporting, or selecting a pond for operations
useCases.result: List of all ponds with their details, fish counts, and last activity.

useCases.name: Get Pond Details
useCases.description: View complete details of a specific pond including fish stock and events.
useCases.when: Detailed pond monitoring or before performing operations
useCases.result: Complete pond information with metadata, fish types, and counts.

phases.name: Phase 3: Fish Species Setup
phases.description: Register fish species that you will be farming

useCases.name: Register Fish Species
useCases.description: Add a new fish species to your farm's catalog. This is done once per species.
useCases.when: When starting to farm a new type of fish

body.description: Fast-growing freshwater fish, ideal for warm climates

useCases.result: Fish species registered with unique species_code for tracking.

useCases.name: Register Another Species (Catfish)
useCases.description: Add catfish species to diversify your farm.

body.description: Hardy bottom-feeder, good for mixed farming

useCases.result: Catfish species added to your farm catalog.

useCases.name: List All Fish Species
useCases.description: View all fish species registered in your farm with their analytics.
useCases.when: Reviewing fish catalog or selecting species for operations
useCases.result: List of all fish species with current analytics and pond locations.

phases.name: Phase 4: Fish Purchase & Stocking
phases.description: Buy fish fingerlings/fry and stock them in ponds

useCases.name: Purchase Fish Fingerlings (via Sampling)
useCases.description: Record purchase of fish fingerlings from a hatchery. This creates stock records and expense entries.
useCases.when: Buying new fish stock from suppliers
useCases.result: Purchase recorded with expense entry. Stock added to pond. Analytics updated.

useCases.name: Stock Fish in Pond (Add Event)
useCases.description: Record stocking of fish into a pond. Use this for internal stock movements or when not tracking purchase cost.
useCases.when: Adding fish to a pond (initial stocking or restocking)
useCases.result: Fish added to pond. Pond metadata updated with fish count. Analytics tracking started.

useCases.name: Record Fish Purchase Expense
useCases.description: Record the financial expense for fish purchase separately.
useCases.when: Tracking costs when purchase wasn't recorded via sampling
useCases.result: Expense recorded for financial tracking and reporting.

useCases.name: Record Daily Feeding
useCases.description: Log feeding activity for a pond. Track feed consumption for FCR calculation.
useCases.when: After each feeding session (typically 2-3 times daily)
useCases.result: Feeding record created. Used for FCR calculation and feed cost tracking.

useCases.name: Record Evening Feeding
useCases.description: Log second feeding of the day.

body.notes: Evening feeding - reduced quantity due to cloudy weather

useCases.result: Evening feeding logged for the pond.

useCases.name: Record Feed Purchase Expense
useCases.description: Track feed purchase costs.
useCases.result: Feed expense recorded for cost analysis.

useCases.name: Create Daily Task
useCases.description: Create tasks for farm workers.

body.title: Check aerators in Pond B
body.description: Inspect all 4 aerators, clean filters, check oil levels

useCases.result: Task created and assigned. Worker gets notification.

useCases.name: Record Water Quality Check
useCases.description: Log water quality parameters for a pond.
useCases.result: Water quality data recorded for trend analysis and alerts.

phases.name: Phase 6: Growth Monitoring & Sampling
phases.description: Track fish growth through periodic sampling

useCases.name: Monthly Growth Sampling
useCases.description: Sample fish to measure growth progress. Essential for estimating harvest timing.
useCases.result: Growth data recorded. Average weight/length calculated. Analytics updated.

useCases.name: Record Sampling via Sampling API
useCases.description: Alternative method to record growth sampling with detailed metrics.
useCases.when: Detailed growth tracking with survival rate and FCR
useCases.result: Detailed growth metrics recorded for analysis and reporting.

useCases.name: Get Fish Analytics
useCases.description: View growth analytics and population data for fish species.
useCases.result: Analytics showing fish counts by age, average weights, and growth trends.

useCases.name: Get Sampling History
useCases.description: View historical sampling data for trend analysis.
useCases.result: List of all sampling records showing growth progression.

phases.name: Phase 7: Fish Mortality & Health Management
phases.description: Handle fish deaths, disease outbreaks, and health issues

useCases.name: Record Fish Mortality
useCases.description: Log fish deaths due to disease, water quality issues, or other causes.
useCases.when: When dead fish are found in the pond

details.notes: Found during morning check. Isolated pond, started treatment.

useCases.result: Mortality recorded. Pond count decreased. Useful for mortality rate calculation.

useCases.name: Record Medicine/Treatment Expense
useCases.description: Track costs for fish treatment and medicine.
useCases.result: Medicine expense recorded for cost tracking.

useCases.name: Create Health Check Task
useCases.description: Schedule health monitoring tasks after disease outbreak.
useCases.when: After disease detection, for follow-up monitoring

body.title: Daily health check - Pond A (Post-treatment)
body.description: Monitor fish behavior, check for new deaths, measure water quality

useCases.result: Recurring task created for health monitoring.

phases.name: Phase 8: Fish Transfer Between Ponds
phases.description: Move fish between ponds (nursery to grow-out, size grading)

useCases.name: Transfer Fish OUT of Nursery Pond
useCases.description: Move fish from nursery pond to grow-out pond. First, record the outgoing transfer.
useCases.when: Fish are ready to move from nursery to grow-out (typically after 2-3 months)

details.notes: Fish reached 150g average, ready for grow-out phase

useCases.result: Fish count decreased in nursery pond. Transfer recorded.

useCases.name: Transfer Fish INTO Grow-out Pond
useCases.description: Complete the transfer by recording incoming fish in the destination pond.
useCases.when: Immediately after shift_out - to maintain accurate counts
useCases.result: Fish count increased in grow-out pond. Transfer complete.

useCases.name: Size Grading - Separate Large Fish
useCases.description: Move larger fish to separate pond for faster harvest.
useCases.when: During grading when fish show size variation

details.notes: Large fish (400g+) moved for early harvest

useCases.result: Large fish separated for faster harvest cycle.

phases.name: Phase 9: Harvest & Sales
phases.description: Harvest fish and record sales transactions

useCases.name: Partial Harvest for Local Market
useCases.description: Harvest a portion of fish for immediate sale to local market.
useCases.when: When fish reach market size and there's buyer demand
useCases.result: Sale recorded. Pond fish count decreased. Ready for revenue tracking.

useCases.name: Record Sales Transaction
useCases.description: Create a transaction record for the sale with payment details.
useCases.when: After harvest, when recording the financial transaction
useCases.result: Transaction recorded for accounts receivable tracking.

useCases.name: Full Pond Harvest
useCases.description: Complete harvest of all fish from a pond.
useCases.when: End of culture cycle, pond draining
useCases.result: Pond emptied. All fish sold. Ready for next cycle.

useCases.name: Record Bulk Sale Transaction
useCases.description: Record large wholesale transaction.
useCases.result: Wholesale transaction recorded with payment tracking.

useCases.name: Record Revenue/Income
useCases.description: Record income from fish sales for accounting.
useCases.result: Income recorded for profit/loss calculation.

phases.name: Phase 10: Financial Management
phases.description: Track all expenses, income, and financial reports

useCases.name: Record Electricity Expense
useCases.description: Track monthly electricity costs for aerators, pumps, etc.
useCases.result: Utility expense recorded.

useCases.name: Record Labor/Salary Expense
useCases.description: Track worker salaries and labor costs.
useCases.result: Labor expense recorded for cost analysis.

useCases.name: Record Equipment Purchase
useCases.description: Track capital expenses for equipment.
useCases.result: Equipment expense recorded as capital asset.

useCases.name: View All Expenses
useCases.description: Get list of all expenses with filters.
useCases.result: Filtered list of expenses for analysis.

useCases.name: View Transactions
useCases.description: Get all financial transactions (sales, purchases).
useCases.result: List of sales transactions for the period.

phases.name: Phase 11: Reporting & Analytics
phases.description: Generate reports and analyze farm performance

useCases.name: Get Pond Events History
useCases.description: View complete history of all events for a pond.
useCases.result: Complete event history showing adds, sales, mortalities, transfers.

useCases.name: Get All Fish Analytics
useCases.description: View analytics for all fish species across the farm.
useCases.result: Aggregated analytics for all species with counts and growth data.

useCases.name: Get Feeding Records by Pond
useCases.description: View feeding history for FCR calculation.
useCases.result: All feeding records for the pond.

useCases.name: Get Fish Statistics
useCases.description: Get statistical data for a specific field.
useCases.result: Statistics (min, max, avg, count) for fish weights.

useCases.name: List Tasks by Status
useCases.description: Review pending or completed tasks.
useCases.result: List of high-priority pending tasks.

phases.name: Phase 12: End of Cycle & Pond Reset
phases.description: Complete a culture cycle and prepare for the next one

useCases.name: Record Pond Maintenance Expense
useCases.description: Track costs for pond cleaning and preparation.

body.description: Pond cleaning and lime treatment after harvest

useCases.result: Maintenance expense recorded.

useCases.name: Update Pond Status
useCases.description: Mark pond as under maintenance or ready for new cycle.
useCases.result: Pond status updated to maintenance mode.

useCases.name: Mark Pond Ready for Stocking
useCases.description: Update pond status when ready for new fish.
useCases.result: Pond marked ready for next stocking cycle.

useCases.name: Delete Pond (if needed)
useCases.description: Remove a pond from the system (e.g., pond decommissioned).
useCases.result: Pond and all related data archived/deleted.
